Frequently Asked Questions

Custom T-shirts for La Jolla, brought to you by Image On!

Greetings from Image On, your one-stop destination for printing excellence serving La Jolla! As a locally-rooted print shop, we're committed to delivering top-notch services right here in the heart of our community. Specializing in custom printed t-shirts and embroidery, our team handles every aspect of production in-house. Get ready to experience seamless service and unmatched quality tailored to the diverse needs of San Diego County. Now, let's dive into some FAQs!

How Much Will My T-Shirt Printing Cost?

  • Price Determinants: The cost is influenced by factors such as the number of shirts, their types, and the intricacy of your design.
  • Large Order Discounts: Local businesses and teams in La Jolla can benefit from significant savings on bulk orders.
  • Design Details: The complexity and color variety of your design can affect the final price.
  • Commitment to Quality: We provide top-notch service and clear pricing for everyone in La Jolla.
  • Affordable Printing Services: Our cheap t-shirt printing options ensure quality at a low cost. Contact us at (619) 312-0941 for more information.

How Fast Can I Receive My Custom T-Shirts?

  • In-House Production: All printing is performed on-site in San Diego, guaranteeing swift service.
  • Quick Turnaround Promise: We are committed to delivering custom t-shirt orders quickly.
  • Typical Turnaround: Most orders are completed within 5 to 7 business days.
  • Rush Services: Expedited options available for urgent needs, completing orders in 1 to 3 business days.
  • Effective Communication: Open dialogue ensures we meet your deadlines and deliver ahead of schedule.
  • Perfect for Special Events: Great for last-minute gifts like Father’s Day or Mother’s Day. Call us at (619) 312-0941.

Do You Require a Minimum Number of T-Shirts to Place an Order?

  • No Minimum Order: We welcome orders of any size, from a single t-shirt to over 10,000 pieces.
  • Bulk Discounts Available: Larger orders receive better pricing, making it cost-effective for La Jolla businesses.
  • Extensive Printing Options: We print on a variety of styles, including polos, sweaters, long-sleeve, short sleeve, and golf shirts.
  • Local Expertise: We are dedicated to serving the La Jolla area with top-notch printing services.
  • For All Purposes: Suitable for personal, corporate, or community needs, we manage orders of all sizes. Call us at (619) 312-0941.

Can I Place a Last-Minute T-Shirt Printing Order?

  • Emergency Orders: We accept last-minute requests and aim to meet your deadlines.
  • Opening Times: Our shop is open from 9 AM to 7 PM, ready for all your t-shirt printing needs in La Jolla.
  • Rush Fee Service: Same-day service available for an additional charge to ensure swift completion.
  • Convenient Location: Ideally placed for quick access to our t-shirt printing services in La Jolla.
  • Range of Apparel: We print on various items such as polos, sweaters, long-sleeve, short sleeve, and golf shirts.
  • Immediate Assistance: For urgent inquiries, contact us at (619) 312-0941.

Do You Provide Photo Printing for T-Shirts?

  • Affordable Photo Prints: Our cost-effective photo printing services make it easy to create personalized t-shirts without breaking your budget.
  • Image Clarity Assurance: Expect superior image clarity and color accuracy with our advanced printing technology.
  • Memorable Designs: Turn your favorite photos into wearable art with custom t-shirts featuring family, newborns, pets, or special occasions.
  • Expert Design Consultation: Count on our team to provide expert guidance on photo layout and placement for your unique apparel.
  • Vintage and Modern Styles: Explore our range of vintage and modern design options to find the perfect look for your personalized shirts.

What Size Range Do You Offer?

  • Comprehensive Selection: Our inventory includes a diverse range of sizes and styles for men's, women's, and children's apparel.
  • Customized Fits: Find the perfect fit with our selection of polos, sweaters, long-sleeve, short sleeve, and golf shirts available in various sizes.
  • Exclusive Collections: Explore our curated collections for men and women, featuring seasonal and themed designs suitable for any occasion.
  • Personalized Options: Create unique apparel for gifts or special events, with customizable sizing options tailored to individual preferences.

At Image On, we're committed to delivering excellence in custom t-shirt printing, embroidery, and print services tailored precisely to your requirements. With our in-house operations, we ensure top-notch quality, efficiency, and affordability, regardless of project size. Whether you're after a unique shirt featuring your grandma's dog or a large batch of embroidered hats for your growing catering business, we're poised and ready to turn your concepts into tangible creations.
